39832780.review:
我是一个小主播，在steam页面看到这个游戏上线之后想第一时间尝试直播一下，加上我自己下播之后的游戏体验，来谈谈我的游戏感受，诚然EA阶段的游戏作品，不能苛求太多，我就把我的直观感受分享出来：
1.这款游戏结合骑砍与FPS游戏的设定，刚开始的时候看trailer以及宣传标语之后就很想进入游戏进行体验，开局一把枪，装备全靠打，但前期经济的来源完全靠游击战争，而且一把手枪，前期的战斗大多是在沙盘上指挥士兵来战斗，而作为指挥官我们只能在云图上规划方向，并不能亲身体验那种带兵打仗的快感，枪械价格的高昂让我对AK M4等步枪望而却步，很明显是在选人和选武器之间强行的让玩家选人，一把手枪根本没办法打天下。
2.游戏的经济系统，雇佣兵加入我的麾下每天需要定时发工资，不定时发工资就会加倍而且士气回严重受挫，而战斗下来之后的金钱收入并不理想，好几次辛辛苦苦的把敌人消灭，所得的钱全部发工资以及填补战死的士兵上了，由于除了敌对方，就是中立方，感觉很难体验到征税，以及其他方面的游戏体验，经济来源是支撑游击战争的关键，这一点需要改进。
3.我尝试过攻占敌对方的小镇，还好旗开得胜，但喜悦的心情在攻占小镇之后的5分钟内，让我想卸载游戏，在我费劲力气把小镇攻克据为己有之后，另外一股势力强行插入，大兵压境吞并了我的小镇，我个人认为，前期金钱对玩家而言是大问题，是否可以考虑给一些和玩家是友好势力的盟军存在，或者说让主角刚开始就拥有一个 小镇，可以慢慢发育。
4.游戏中除了战斗之中的第一人称视角之外，很难感受到互动感，在小镇上规划的一些设施也只是一些小小蓝图，由于此前小镇攻略失败，让我暂时没有兴趣继续玩耍下去，但我会保持关注，希望游戏可以做的更好。
5.当然还是希望官方可以重视中文版本，虽然游戏里一些设定我能看懂，但还是希望可以的话加入中文版本
以上就是我的个人感受，自由人：游击战争，希望能够越做越好！
我是虎牙主播:GGPANDA

39831883.review:
UPDATED REVIEW



- be me
- 5 veteran merc squads are being absolutely squashed by a superior force while i'm trying to cap this city
- I happen to be hitler so little does my enemy know i have around 6 other squads still not deployed
- crouching behind a tree trunk i go into the tactical map 
- panic as i hear bullets landing around me 
- oh shit oh shit
- quickly swap the low morale, 1,2/5 squads out for fresh 5/5 100 morale ones
- change tactics to slowly circle around the enemy and force them into a choke point 
- I win spectacularily with only 11 casualties( around 7 injured since i have lvl 10 first aid) while the enemy has 72 dead.

I bought this game 2 days after release, i recommended then, even though it was a pretty buggy game at the time. I had my fun with it and moved on, after going back to it recently i was amazed at the progress. hitboxes are spot on, the developpers are introducing character customization, there are weapon accessory( rudemental for now but they're improving it) , a LOT of the bugs are gone and the whole experience is much smoother now. I personally dont buy into early access games and i went into this with skepticism. But i'm not disappointed in it one bit.  If i could super recommend it, i would.
STILL WORTH A BUY? YES.
STILL FUN? YES
STILL BUGGY? YEAAAH BUT THEY'RE FAR AND FEW NOW, AND NO MORE GAMEBREAKING ONES.
EARLY ACCESS? PRETTY OBVIOUS
IS THERE HOPE FOR IT? ABSOLUTELY.

没玩过骑砍，但我觉得这游戏挺有意思的，玩法也很新鲜！现在正在摸索该怎么玩，如何指挥！第一次指挥攻击一个12人小队自己人死了一半，小手枪完全打不到人只能躲后面指挥了嘿嘿嘿！看来以后有必要在游戏前拜一拜我们的李云龙李团长，掌握意大利炮的核心科技才能一统世界！游戏刚出，但体验让我还是满意的，希望作者大大以后会更新创意工坊和汉化！
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2月6号游玩体验：游戏更新了，可以开始调分辨率还有加载界面什么的很棒，今天才知道游戏还自带作弊器，按end键开启！（对于没耐心发展的玩家是一大福音吧）但是我游玩时发现了一些问题，今天我买了把狙击枪去打土匪根据地时发现趴在树后面开镜居然可以穿墙并且开枪打到后面的敌人，蹲着或者站着就不能穿墙开镜了！而且开镜打近处时弹起的灰尘是在瞄准镜准星的上面偏左，这个我不懂是不是正常的！（不太懂枪这些）有一些树的建模之间有狭小的缝隙，还有建筑的门时可以直接穿过的，车子都可以穿过！敌人的尸体近处开镜居然看不见，是消失的，推着推着尸体走会尸体消失只显示影子在，走远一点尸体就会出现！打完土匪窝后游戏里显示还有敌人，我派兵把整个地图搜遍了也没找到那剩下的十几个敌人，我占据根据地时游戏正上方有红色的条条不知道是怎么看的，开始是不断增加，然后又减少到没有，派兵驻守红圈里的根据地很长时间也没提示是不是占领了，退也退不了（可能是我不会玩不知道怎么操作吧）然后再希望作者大大可以出一个开镜屏息时可以稍微放大一下瞄准镜画面的功能，眼睛快贴屏幕上还是看不见那比蚂蚁还小的敌人，哪怕只有狙击枪有也好的！最后还是求一个汉化和武器可以自定义瞄准镜！
··································································································································
2/23体验：更新中文了！赞一个制作者大大！现在有天气系统，昼夜系统不错，夜视仪望远镜手电用处也很大，大地图空格加速流畅了！战斗地图不再只有野地了，多了营地等建筑，夜晚配上夜视仪真有感觉，整体游玩体验很棒！同时个大大个建议，士气什么的不要单一的靠给钱，完全可以增加一些小任务或者其他物品什么的，也希望可以进入自己的城镇，可以和自己的村民士兵互动什么的！做做npc任务提升忠诚度什么的也不错的！希望制作者大大可以考虑一下！
..........................................................................................................................................................
3/10体验：官方更新就不说了，更新存档会消失！枪的后坐力感觉削了不少，不喜欢！更新的几把狙击枪没啥后座力感觉就像在玩玩具枪一样，瞄具没有啥高倍的，狙击枪远处打人就很伤了！这次虽然更新的人物很棒，但是其他方面差强人意，还有游戏帧数最高就只有30帧吗？我不管什么画质都是30帧最高了，游戏里也没找到怎么调高帧数！最后还是希望制作组再接再厉吧！建议加一个坐标什么的，每次都要看地图找方向好麻烦！

39831477.review:
Yes yes it's like a combination of M&B and Arma, but that isn't what should draw you to this game.
What should draw you to this game is the fact that only 48 hours out of release this game has established a community of passionate people working around 3 devs to help make this game as good as it can possibly be (Not to mention it's more polished than most early access games 2 days into release). This isn't your average early access game, this is going to be a game that in a year we will barely be able to recognize from it's raw form right now, and for the better. The devs take advice and suggestions from people in their discord group and even talk about them with people in there as well to help find what's best for the future of this game. 
If you're looking for a game that is establishing it's OWN identity behind a great little community and team of developers then this is a game you should pick up without a doubt.

39828621.review:
NOTE: There are a lot of issues!

If you've ever played Mount & Blade, it's quite similar.
With a bit of diplomacy, commanding, and first person shooting action, the gameplay is fairly dynamic.
I could go on listing issues, but it's not needed because everyone already knows it's super raw. To be honest, I think they should have waited a few more months before realising, they could have gained more hype, and cranked out some of the super lame bugs. (One of the worst glitches I've seen is getting in a fight with an enemy unit of 30 men, defeating 10 of them and losing, loading the save, and even though my men are replenished because I've loaded my save, they for some reason have only 20 men as if the battle still happened yet only affected them). 

The gameplay could use polishing and it feels a bit empty to only have infantry in a game where you're attempting to take over entire areas. Things like airpower, artillery, larger units that are comprised of multiple squads so controling more troops is easier, and a more intuitive UI system would all help the game greatly. [b]The only reason I recommend this game in the state that it's in is based on the assumption that this game will have more content and that it will be polished.	[/b]

39826158.review:
Mount and Blade с пушками.

Плюсы:
Управление отрядами с помощью тактической карты.
Экономика и рекрутирование собственной армии.
Приятный и знакомый геймплей (есть в равной степени детали стратегии и шутера, каждый найдет свое).
Многообразие фракций и различных политик (подобно M&B).

Минусы:
Графон (кусты и трава следят за тобой!).
Сложность в освоении (например, патроны для оружия покупаются обоймами, вешаются на пояс и заряжаются полностью, даже при наличии неотстреляных патронов. Отстреляв все обоймы, приходится возвращатся к зеленому ящику за новыми, если они у вас вообще были в инвентаре, а оружие с убитых во время боя не поднять. Все отстрелянные обоймы пропадают и  приходится возвращаться в город за новыми.)

Итог:
Играть можно. Стоит купить (пока цена не взлетела) и ждать релиза, должно выйти что-то интересное.

39823587.review:
Not really that great. Its shallow and it's just a mod to Mount and Blade, and it's not anywhere near finished. The idea is nice, but in execution it's pretty lacking. Looks like there is like one square wilderness (mount and blade sized) map. There is no compass, no tactical map. And its hard to see the enemy who can see right through the foliage and aimbot you.

I think the last straw is when the enemy took a town from me by just walking into it. I was actively killing them, and they just were awarded the town. On the flipside YOU CANT do that, you have to kill or route the enemy. It also removed my garrison forces when I went to defend it.

Its really a bad implementation of a Mound and Blade mod as it's lacking just about everything. No towns to walk around in, no NPCs, no Companions...just some dumb AI squadmates.

Pretty bad, it's not awful for the price (10 dollars) but I doubt most people will get more than 2-3 hours out of it before they realize there is basically nothing to this "game" and it has a ton of bugs a missing features from even free mods that you can find for Mount and Blade.
39823587.developer_response:
Hi, thanks for the review. We are aware that the game is nowhere near the finished state and there are a lot of bugs and missing features. But that is the reason why we choose to Early Access it so we can get a lot of constructive feedback from the community. We don't mind negative feedback at all because that only helps us improve the game step by step and that is all we want. Anyone is welcome to join our steam discussion or Discord server to express options on how to make things better.
We are actually aiming to be different than Mount&Blade and trying to incorporate features that mount&blade doesn't have and what the players truly hope to see in the game.

M＆B現代戦仕様って感じのゲームです。
もうこれで大体説明が終わりました。

独自要素はほぼ無いと言っていいので、ある意味では志の低いゲームなのですが、
それを補ってあまりある武器モーションの数々がとにかく素晴らしい。
気持ち悪い程こだわりぬいた精緻なモデリングとモーションは一見の価値あり。

恐らく車両が本格的に導入されてからが本番かと思われるので、この勢いでスタッフには突っ走って欲しい。

最後にもう一度書きますが銃のモデリングとモーションはとにかく出来がよい。

39820907.review:
A 'Mount & Blade' clone utilizing a 'Modern Warfare' theme. 

Currently in an Alpha stage with a feel like the original 'Mount and Blade' as far as the development in graphics, UI and basic gameplay are concerned. Hopefully this will be polished before it comes to release, but that is likely to be a long way off unless it gains investor backing. Definately worth the financial support if the developer(s) continue on a progressive path and the public intrest increases.

Overall I would recommend investing in the Alpha stages to promote its' continued growth and experience a different feel for a growing genre thanks to the pioneers TaleWorlds Entertainment and SiCh Studio. If medievil warfare isn't your style and you prefer a 'Call of Duty' theme for this genre, then this game is definately for you.

This game has so much potential, I know it is a early-access. But I sense a real real real potential in it. Wonderfuly like Arma and Mount & Blade, my two favorite games. 
Its a wonderful mixture and it can be so cool if you guys (devs) are really willing to make a real and complet game and taking the same way as Taleswords did, they did not expected that and look where they are now. Now its your turn fellas.
I bought this game cause I know it will be masterfully great.

What I think this game has to get as new features ? 
-You begin with nothing at all, no armies, you become a mercenary who in the past was brainwashed to kill, but now its the time of revenge, you bring justice or make a tyranny of this world and become a dictator.

-Train soldiers from all around the world, recruit them from retired SAS, S13, Navy Seals...

咳....该怎么说这款游戏呢，我就个人观点的简单说一下几个值得买的地方和缺点吧。
值得买的地方：
1.跟游戏介绍的一样，这游戏有着骑砍的自由度和FPS游戏的玩法。（开局十个人，装备全靠刷）玩着有着一种别样的新鲜感。
2.游戏在指挥部队方面比骑砍好很多，操作起来也不会太难。
3.还算是可以的画面，加上还算可以的音效，以及在战斗BGM都算是在其他游戏算不错的了。
缺点：
1.有点别扭的枪械手感和节奏缓慢的战斗，打个人半天没找到。
2.画面的过亮（反正我玩的有点眼睛痛_(:з」∠)_）以及音效的重复率。
3.由于是早期版本，所以在很多方面都不完善。
总结：
虽然现在看起来游戏一般般，比不上骑砍，但我相信后续版本的更新应该会弥补现在的不足。
所以，
我TM玩爆！！

39818883.review:
Игра сырая, некая пре-альфа или альфа версия.
Графон и окружение явно не конек игры. Кусты бетонные, трава и прочее просто страшно смотреть...
Непонятная баллистика. 
ИИ - очень туповат, стреляют в землю, могут стоять на месте и тупить.
Нестабильный фпс на хорошем железе.

Разрешение экрана, не расчитано для UltraWide мониторов. Изображение уходит за пределы экрана.
Если выставить 1920x1080 и свернуть игру, то разрешение слетает и устанвливается максимальное 2560x1080 в итоге элементы опять за экраном и если у вас был открыт какое то меню на весь экран, то уже не сможете закрыть.
Приходится вновь заходить в пункт настроек, тогда разрешение нормализуется..... И так каждый раз. 

Есть баг с сохранениями:
Сохраняемся перед боем, нападаем на врага ( например их 30), убиваем сколько можем врага (оставили 20 врагов) . Загружаем вновь игру. У противника останется те же 20 бойцов, а у нас все что было перед сохранением.
Словно игра сохраняет только информацию по вашему инвентарю и бойцам, по миру инфу не сохраняет или криво.

В одном из боев противника было 19, убили 2 врагов, по счетчику их стало 17. Убиваем дальше, счетчик не меняется, и магическим образом враг исчезает с карты, но его модельки остаются летать в воздухе, как и счетчик завис на 17, т.е. вы не можете никого убить и выйграть, только бежать до конца карты и сбежать с поля боя....

Пока не рекомендую. Задумка хорошая.
Если игра будет развиваться и её не забросят как очередной быстрый проект с ранним доступом, то возможно и выйдет отличный гемплей.

39817905.review:
Nach langer Absitenz schaute ich mal wieder im Steam Store vorbei und wollte mal was neues spielen. Allerdings sollte es ein Strategie Spiel sein. 
Direkt auf der Startseite wurde mir dann dieses angezeigt. 
Strategische Kriegsführung mit RolePlay und First Person ? Cool ! Genau das was ich seit Jahren gesucht habe!
Im Angebot war es auch, also schnell geholt und installiert (2,5GB).

Das Gameplay selbst ist interresant und die Idee ist gut. 
Gleich zu Anfang legte ich mich dann mit einem gegnerischen Battalion an und verlor direkt ^^ 
Hätte darauf achten sollen welche Stärke dieses hat.
Also nochmal neu angefangen...
Passenden Gegner gesucht und auf in den Kampf.
Nachdem meine Truppen gespawnt waren, befahl ich ihnen in der Kommandoansicht vorzudringen. 
Schnell gewechselt und im Schlechmodus mit meinen Truppen dem Gegner auf die Pelle gerückt.
Leider hatte ich nur eine Pistole und mein Team hatte automaische Waffen. Somit hielt ich mich erstmal zurück und ließ meine Jungs kämpfen.
Dann ergab sich beim Flankieren der Gegnerischen Stellung die Möglichkeit und ich erldigte einen mit der Pistole ^^
Schlacht gewonnen und zusätzlich noch gut gelootet (Nahrung, Munition und Geld).
Von dem Geld dann in der nächsten Stadt ne kleine Automatikwaffe erstanden.
Dann den nächsten Gegner gesucht und das selbe von vorne, jedoch diesmal mit einer anderen Taktik.

Fazit:
Sehr gut gelungenes Spiel mit deutlich großen Potential nach oben.
Es lassen sich unberenzte verschiedene Stategien austesten und so ist jeder Kampf einzigartig.
Klare Kaufempfehlung.

39817300.review:
这个游戏总的来说还是很有意思的，未来也非常有潜力，并且我不介意在游戏成熟时给与好评，尽管以较高的标准来要求一款仍然处于EA阶段的新游戏显得有些过于苛刻，但是现阶段的游戏体验，我只能说的确差到了极点。
      首先游戏本身优化我觉得还行，尽管游戏要求配置着实吓人一跳，但是我1050ti，8g内存能够流畅的跑起高画。而且硬件温度并不高。这可以说是一个加分点。
      其次，游戏射击，或者说战斗系统还是不错的，枪械射击手感尚可。号称骑马与砍杀与武装突袭之子。我武装突袭部分姑且认了，毕竟这游戏的装备栏位，各种参数对于一个5G的游戏来说，已经做的相当不错了。
      但是，一谈到骑马与砍杀like部分，我就来气。首先就是，战斗缴获系统和物价经济系统。一场战斗完之后，只能缴获弹匣和部分货物，敌人的武器装备全部不见踪影，游戏内一把枪的价格，例如akm，标价5500左右，你在初期一场战斗中的收入大约是1000的现金+500的物资。那么，看似你只需要4次战斗就能鸟枪换炮，但是实际上这都是梦想。你手下的工资都是按天发的，例如我现在带着4队高级兵，每天工资大约是3000，每次战斗减员同样需要大约支付1000-2000来补充人力，每1-2场战斗期间还需要花钱来提振前面伤亡过大的部队的士气。这样反复循环下来，玩家几乎是在游戏刚刚度过初期就陷入了0收入的循环。而且这还是在战斗顺利没有大伤亡的前提下，如果自身阵亡或者一场战斗伤亡过大，玩家几乎就是破产了，可以开新档了。
     物价系统同样很糟糕，初期玩家倒是可以不断的通过跑商赚钱，但是一旦度过了初期，你会发现你跑商的利润甚至低于你部队一天的工资。同样更神奇的是，一支rpd机枪的价格是8000左右，而一支3人均装备机枪的机枪小队的雇佣价格只有3500.如果算上他们身上的其他东西，他们一个人的装备大概就值3w左右。当然骑马与砍杀同样存在着这样的情况，即部队的雇佣价格远远低于他们铠甲武器的成本数十倍。但是MB中，工资按周结，这游戏按天算。再加上无法缴获装备的缴获系统，玩家完美的雇不起人，买不起装备。养不起部队。
    其他的像玩家在游戏里的模型只有手，敌人会对天发呆之类的bug，官方已经承诺修正或者正在开发中，就不特别吐槽了。
    不得不说，这个游戏目前的确对得起他的价格，确实只值这个价，但是这个游戏灰常有潜力。如果你非要玩这个游戏的话，我觉得可以考虑，初期杀6个人到3级，然后放弃战斗，技能全加交易，解散所有部队。专心跑商，攒钱买一把21000的狙击枪，然后再开始你的游戏。
    最后总结一下差评的理由，尽管我承认这游戏很有潜力，游戏处于ea，有问题无可厚非，游戏目前完成度和游戏性还马马虎虎，但是我觉得我玩得很累，游戏目前不合理的设定让我在浪费了大量精力和时间的同时，并没有收获相应的乐趣。而我希望通过这个差评提醒官方注意我提到的问题。

1.003 版本幽灵手已经消失了，玩家的模型可能是彻底被取消了，但是命中机制依然很蛋疼，有时候枪都插到敌人身体里了，依然未命中。前面说的买狙，emmmm，我攒钱买了把狙击，结果，难用到了极点，尤其是经常出现的迷之未命中。所以还是ak赛高。

感觉今天开始玩的时候，已经没有前几次开档那样艰难了，加上老铁们分享的bug和作弊，我决定好评！
39817300.developer_response: 你好，感谢你忠肯的评价。现在游戏处于EA阶段有大量内容需要后续追加，以及游戏平衡需要极大程度的完善。我们其实不希望原封不动的把骑砍的RPG部分搬过来。我们希望加入一些独特的元素到我们的系统里，比如更加完善和有意义的城镇建设，更趋近现实的部队后勤系统等，甚至未来的多兵种混合作战。这些当然需要玩家提供建设性的反馈才能做得到。如果你有更多的建议请加入我们的Discord参与讨论，我们有会说中文的同事专门和汉语玩家交流。谢谢！ https://discord.gg/playfreeman

39816640.review:
Buy this game, buy this game, buy this game, buy 5 copies of this game and give the other 4 out to friends. Buy another copy and install in on your computer at work, then buy a third and install it on your Macbook you use to write poems sometimes. This game is amazingly brutal, the gun play is fantastic, the AI is intuitive and responsive to the world around it. It is quite literally the entire package, please help support these wonderful devs further improve this masterpiece by buying as many copies as you can feasibly afford. 

However let it be known that there are still several annoying bugs/in development features, such as some guns have a wierd problem with the iron sights; when you sight in on enemies at close range the rounds will fly over them even though you have them zeroed. 

The Game is brutal in every way, you will be crushed and spit on and chewed up and shot a thousand times before you even get close to your first real city siege. You will spend hours cultivating a small profeesional army, only to be outflanked and ambushed by Uman terrorists and subsequently leave your entire force dead on the field. You will become frustrated by the lack of battle continuation after death/ ridiculously one sided dice rolls for the battle sim. You will get flanked, pincered, ambushed, blown up, shot, and cornered by the enemy. As of right now the character customization is lacking, trade is abyssmal, and your options in gameplay revolve entirely around open field battles and city sieges, however let it be noted that this game is still in Beta and more content is surely on its way.

Let it also be known that while you're fighitng in the fields and in the streets, you'll be involved in intense and gratifying gunbattles, and you'll truly be the leader of a small army. The AI will test your ability to both A) Fight in first person, use cover and concealment effectively, and manage your ammunition and weapons efficiently as well as B) Utilize your Squads of soldiers to the best of their ability, read terrain and interpret enemy movements and feints and respond accordingly, and react to the ever changing situation that is a modern battlefield

This game does not let up, a single squad in the right location at the right time can change the course of the battle even in the face of a superior force. Snipers will routinely ruin your day, and MG's will shred your defensive positions. Every battle is different and challenging, and at no point in the game are you ever equipped to fight alone or without support. 

This game is definetly one of my top 10's already, keep up the good work devs!

39814115.review: 이 게임은 가능성이 충분해 보입니다 특히 마운트앤 블레이드 게임류를 좋아하신다면 당연 이게임도 좋아하실 겁니다 (아마도?) 그러나 정말 아쉽게도 지금 현재 상태에서는 너무나도 많이 부족합니다 . 군사의 종류, AI의  서로 다른 팩션들이 전투를 하지 않으며, 막연하게 처음부터 병사 10명과 함꼐 세상에 던져지는(?) 거 같습니다 .그리고 신기하게 END 버튼을 누르면 치트를쓸수 있으며 돈, 경험치 , 적을 죽이는 치트 등 살짝 처음부터 먼치킨(?)적 군벌이 될수 있습니다  능력치 배분, 레벨업 시스템은 마운트앤블레이드 를  하셨던 분이라면 익숙해집니다. 군대의 수가 아무리 많아서 커맨더 스킬이 부족하면 전투에 투입할 수 있는 스쿼드 수가 제한됩니다. 그런데 커맨더 찍는게 5이상 안찍어 드는데 이것에 대해서는 저도 잘 모르겠습니다 . 그리고 전투에서는 살짝 총의 반동이나 그런게 거의없는 (?)  거 같으며 살짝 지휘와 fps 전투 화면을 이리저리 왓다갓다 해야하는데 마운트앤 블레이드 처럼 좀 단축키를 활용할 수 있으면 좋았을 겁니다 . 그리고 전투시 살짝 아쉬운것은 사운드인데 내가 총을 쏘는데 총소리가 좀 씹히는 경향이 있습니다. 즉 총을 사격 하는데 총소리가 간혹 안나는 경우가 있습니다 . 아르마 같은 전투를 기대하셧다면 아쉬울수 있습니다 . 그러나 확실한것은 이 게임에 여러가지 무기와 군사의 종류, 여러가지 이벤트와 스토리 등을 추가하고 조금 부족한 것들 (총소리가 갑자기 안나는 버그??) 등 을 패치하면 좋을 거 같습니다 . 그리고 한글화..도 해주며 좋겟지만 안해주겟죠  부디 제작자 분들 께서 노력하셔서 여러가지 패치를 빠르시일내로 해주시길 소원합니다 이상입니다 .

39813004.review: To be fairly honest, i wasn't expecting much out of the game, specially when i read of how early in development it was, but i'm going to be fairly honest, i'm really surprised with it so far, it features a robust combat system that's really enjoyable, all weapons have an appropiate kick to them and the gun sounds are just lovely though a tad bit deafening at times, the system for controlling the squads in the game is very reminiscent of what C&C Tiberium was going to use and it's very intuitive and nice, the game has a couple of bugs here and there but the dev team from what i've seen is dedicated and works heavily on the game, so i have all confidence that they'll get patched quite quickly (Hell, the AI was spawning right on top of my spawn point last night, i woke up today to find out that there was a patch and boom, haven't seen it happen again) so i have to say, this is absolutely a thumbs up for the game, it has a long way to go, but what it has now is really nice and solid and with the dedicated dev team that it has it'll most likely reach far.

39812314.review:
8.4 hours in, had to go over 4 new game because of game breaking mechanic. I would consider this game to be in Alpha state and not beta, went in comparing this as if it was a warband mount and blade with gun, only to be dissapointed by the many and many bugs and cannot customize weapon.

1- they allow you to leave the map during a battle, if you dont retreat your squad before leaving and engage in the same fight again afterward your squad will be left floating somewhere on the map without being able to give order to.

2- sometime you kill ennemy on the battlefield and thier dead body model stands with guns in thier hand freezed acting as if they were alive. really annoying as you don't know what is alive and what is not.

3- Grenade doesn't even apply damage to the thrower.

4- Trading is completely static, the game starts and it's basicaly randomized which town wants what ressource for extra cash, but some high value ressources might not even be wanted at all in the map as there is not enough town to cover all the ressource. 1 ressource wanted per town pretty much limit the trading system. ( You can start a game and basicly it will be a shit game for trading).

5- Grenade feels so clunky to use, you throw them and they slide on the ground so far, its basicly impossible to throw a grenade 20 meter off of you. You would have to look at your feet to throw it at that distance and would slide up to the area you want it to explode.

6- AI on the map stands and do notting, there are no trader to intercept or highjack.

7- Lack of purpose.

8- the battle scenery is the same everywhere.

9- Starting the game off with a pistol ironsight against ennemy that has AK give me aids.

10- F the police, I just did thier QA bug testing for like 8 hours and pretty sure I wont get paid.

I would wait before buying. I have no idea why the review are like 90% + positive but the game in this state right now is a big *You should wait*, because of all the things they need to fix and change to make this even a beta.

2/10. Would create a new game again to get fucked by the trading system and get stuck in a fight loosing your save progress again.

39810341.review:
My thoughts thoughts so far at about 2 hours in:

Basically even at this really early stage this game is a fantastic proof of concept and, more importantly, runs fine and plays well. What it needs most, I think, is to greatly expand on its base especially regarding the top-down world map. Quests and more faction interaction would be very welcome as the early game currently seems to involve grinding the same 12-man bandit groups until you can get a decent weapon (which is 2-3x more expensive than just recruiting more men, which kind of almost locks off the FPS portion of the game for the first hour or so.) Besides for that the thing most in demand is really just some QOL things esp wrt menus, options, etc. 

As it stands this game seems to be in a really good place as far as early access goes and I'm very excited to see how far they'll be able to take it. 

Just another quick 2 cents - releasing modding tools and integrating vehicles like tanks and helicopters would take this game from a fun proof-of-concept to a genre-pioneering masterpiece like Mount and Blade before it.

39808210.review:
NOTICE:  I won a free key from KK Game Studios.  And yes, I know I have only played 1.2 Hours before reviewing this game.

STATEMENT:
*     Tazou here from Earthbound Gamers.  This is a Neutral Review of KK Game Studio's EA Release Title "Freeman: Guerrilla Warfare".  By no means was this an paid review and it will be strictly a fair review.

OVERALL:
*     I would say that even for Freeman being out within 48 Hours, this game is GREAT!  These guys took a risk by incorporating ARMA Style Combat and feel with the game mechanics of Mount & Blade and made it work.  I would be lying to say that it is perfect at this point but for just having only its' "Core" features only, it is standing on its' own as being a very popular Indie Dev. Title.  Starting out with only two squads, a pistol and low ammo and supplies, you are forced to roam around a world style map in which you can encounter many different faction groups, towns to trade, loot or attack as well as to garrison structures afterwards.  As you progress, you can apply points into both your squads to upgrade their skills, armor and weapons as well as yourself with a huge variety of skills to benefit both yourself AND your squads.  Currently, there are no vehicles or task so you have to roam and engage camps, towns/cities and patrolling troops on the go to earn your Loot and Money.  Did I mention that you had to pay your troops and keep them well fed?  Well, I did now!  There are many aspects of the game currently implimented with a wide range more on the way or planned for the future!  Now, for the points:

POSITIVE:
* Surprisingly Challanging
* Simple Battle Map Overview
* Well Optimized (Will run on just about any System) despite requirements
* Simple UI (In/Out of Battle)
* Need to actually plan where your troops go.  They can die quite easily if you don't plan well!

NEGATIVES:
* World Map seems quite small despite its actual size
* Waypoint System is quite clunky (I know, in EARLY EA)
* Earned Currency seems to be quite low (It WILL take you a while to buy a basic Main Slot Gun)
* Only start with a Pistol, 2x Granades and 2x Squads (Which can be useful and sometimes are not!)
* Several known game breaking bugs have been reported (Save/Load Bug) to wipe troops and inventory

All-in-all, this game seems to be pretty solid despite some of the odd bugs or lack of content at this point but again, it is only under 48 hours old.  Many more features are soon to be planned and released soon but for now, give them a rest and let them rejoice for releasing such a great EA Title!

39806866.review:
I rarely leave reviews, but this game deserves one. The tactical combat feels deep and impressive already - if you enjoy the gunplay in Squad, Arma, Insurgency, or any other mil-sim game, then you will enjoy it here.  The squad commands and leadership abilities are excellent, and if you enjoy strategy, there is plenty of depth, but if you don't want to go to that level, you don't have to.  You can tailor your setup and your army composition to your liking, and then use it to conquer the world.

While at this point there is little in the way of campaign controls and the overland map is relatively small and sparse, as of this writing the game was only released yesterday so I am excited for what continued development brings, and at this price, there is little excuse for not trying it out.

39806446.review: 看到这个评测的话有点长希望能看完，或者把他顶上去让其他人看到。为了你的游戏体验，请在前期将难度调到简单，视情况调到非常简单，不然你非常非常难打到一身好装备并且你的人口很难上去，我也不知道为什么战场我只能带7只部队即使我总队伍过百，打一个70人口的城镇，说真的我100多纯精锐被压着打感受不到数量的优势。  （我给你举一个我打城镇的例子，对面80人口我90人口，对面全部是土匪我这边是来自全国各地的精英战士和雇佣兵老兵，开始，我只能上30人口的部队，对面是54，然后整局你都想骂MMP，我带这么多部队拿的都是精锐被打成ZZ，我菜行了吧是我菜我这么多年的RTS和FPS都是白玩的我是假的好吧。）  并且游戏里没有自动战斗的功能我城镇里的50人口的精锐被40人口的土匪围住了电脑叫我去救，还给了我时间限制，我就在想是不是如果我没在规定的时间去救那么城镇会直接炸掉或者是在判定极其不合理的情况下让我的部队损失大半。哪这样的话如果到后面开战的多了我TM哪里来的精力一个个去救，并且你得知道城镇里的援军不像骑砍那样是自己刷的，是要我拿自己的部队放进去！！！            最后我想说现在这个游戏的机制不是很合理，休闲玩一下确实非常的开心，拿着一把大狙一个个锤死真的很爽，最后好评是给简中的，开发组重视中国玩家，期待后续的更新

39805815.review:
目前玩法上还是比较单一，但却是是一款很有潜力的游戏。
    1. 操作玩法上希望加上第一人称指挥，最好能有一些编程好的快捷指令，如向我靠拢，掩护我（指挥官再怎么说也得有点“军官待遇”吧），散开，hold，全员冲锋（乌拉~）；
        或者是编队指令，成尖刀队形搜索前进，成搜索队形散开，前方50m匍匐跃进之类的比较常用的战场指令；
        希望再加上一些辅助系统，指南针，hud小地图，敌人高亮标识（在被己方或自己发现时），武器配件尤其是配镜自定义，交火一般的都在100~400左右，所以近距离低倍镜就配置在主瞄具侧面，以切换瞄具的形式使用（COD13里的侦查瞄准镜为例）。
        游戏地图最好能再美化一些，粒子特效啊之类的增加战场气氛，多加一些掩体，既然主要在林地或平原多加些大石头在空旷的地方或者多些树木在林地里，除了增加环境丰富度和真实度，在石头上如苔藓或者小蚂蚁之类的细节更能起到美化作用。
        bug要修复，敌人死了定在原地的，打着打着突然朝天射击的 队友，有时候从掩体边上探头射击打在掩体上之类的。
        Ai优化，敌人和队友都能更敏捷一些（运动更流畅些），增加滑铲或翻过障碍物，如攻城的时候房子周围的木栅栏翻不过去。
     2.故事内容，突发事件，npc更多互动，接任务，每个faction最好都有故事或者说历史，为啥在众多faction中我们就能最后统治全地图单单靠武力是不够的，强行武力必然会带来后果，相对的善意援助也会有意想不到的结果，这部游戏能否给玩家带来除了征服世界的快感外，更进一步加深对世界的理解才是这部游戏能升华的地方（旅行者青蛙在这方面做的就非常不错）。
        总之，不断的改进和学习一定能让这部游戏逐渐变好，期待将来社区中大家互相分享经验的场景。

I like this game.
I like the "Arma meets Warband" aspect of it.
The battles feels alright. Even if i dont fight personaly to much. 
The fact that you have to have to pay your troops everyday was a bit *Urgh*. But dont worry. The days are long. How long Idk. And you can chose when to pay the troops. (you can skip a day or to..To a higher price)  Which brings us to the first issue...

Time!  I can see what day it is. And thus when its a new day.  However.. I cant see what time of day it is. (Minor issue but still placing in out there)

Second issue: FOOD !  How much can some people eat! (!!) I havent been in military service. (Been in a youth org for a few weeks then other stuff happed) But im very sure that you aint given food every hour to eat. But a days ration (Morning midday evening).  Drains econom at times but not to major ether.
 
I love that towns keep to their "Hey! This item we need!" (I mean that). Although sometimes i notice that loading a save (more on that later) that they change the requested item/resorce. So check before you go on your usual trade rout... (saves cash) 

More on the save...
So I launched an attack on a settlement for fun. (Lost ofc) And then i reloaded... Aaand I saw that I only had 26 solders (I had 40 when i popt the save) So sometimes (Sometimes not allways). Another time I did the same thing but because i though i acually had it (i didnt) And when i reloaded  I relize... I relize that although i got all my troops back.. I still owed my solders 4000 in wages that i didnt pay them before reloading. XD -(Oi ! Davaris, we didnt get payed before you loaded game)-

And sometimes if you have 2000 and spend some of it.. You get the cash that you had left over (but not the items)

So yea.. The saving and loading needs a bit of... Work...

Otherwise... OH yea!  I only got attacked once. Once! The AI is quite passive towards everyone (despite beeing at war ( I like that i get left alone though. Makes trade easier)) One time ( XD ) one time I had a Uman Terorist army following me where ever i went. (I mean it) Ther followed me and wanted to attack me. But i guess their coding was broken. Quite fun though.      Also about that time i got attacked. I still felt like the attacker. (Or i was just impacient) so ya.

Talking about battles...  Whats the point about the red Cirkle if the enemy dont spawn in it at times?  Oh about that! It makes for some fun moments and quick repositioning of your troops.  I remember one time sending all my troops That what way up a hill, Only to hear a lot of bullets whisteling about. So i though "Hmm..." And open my map...  Turns out the enemy was deployed In the other direktion so i was just to reorder my troops back to spawn and make a mad dash for cover XD.  Funny time..

Oh yeah that "press delete to canscel order" Ye, doent work..

On the "campaign map" I saw a few abbandond outposts (I say that because noone owned them) And i couldnt take them over for myself (Would be nice you know, HQ and that stuff, train soldiers.)
Also about the map it feels bland.. Sure lots of  Groups walking aroud (JK most of them just stands around) No caravans no civilians* (*wtf would civilians move around in this time of crysis?)
But you know some minor villages that villagers goes to and from trying to make a living. (aswell as caravans).

Anyway I think thats all  Not to serious (Appart from the loading a save) (Also would be nice to join a factions, then again its about you taking over).

Again sweet game I like it and i hope to see some patches that (fixes the loading issues) adds things and fetures soon. Like making your base in one of those abandond outposts.

P.S. if you think you will get a better gun then the markarov by fighting.. Forget it.  I found 2 glocks and 1 other makarov pistol.  And that was far and few between...

39802929.review:
Game's only just been released yesterday and it's already a fun concept that's got immense potential. 

Imagine PUBG's post-apocalyptic, vaguely Russian setting, but you get to command a merry band of soldiers and conquer territory on a world map ala Mount and Blade, while still retaining the FPS mechanics of a game like PUBG. 

For an early access game, the graphics and gunplay are smooth and the battles, while small at first, manage to scratch your tactical itch as you maneuver your squads to flank, take cover, or charge the enemy with all guns blazing. 

I'm liking this game, would definitely recommend its progress be followed if nothing else.

39802800.review:
Edit: Don't listen to the naysayers the game isn't worth you money at this current stage. You can easily decide that yourself by watching the trailers. It shows you exactly what you are going to get and at this current stage in EA, nothing more. 

Less than €12,- currently. Break that bank and live on the wild side lel.

[b]"Review"[/b]
Mount&Blade with an A-Team / Jagged Alliance vibe. This vibe makes it rather unique in this genre. It's usually medieval or magic. 

[b]Pro's[/b]
+ Gunplay feels half decent for an unpolished EA release, which is the 50% why you should be getting this game. 
+ A-Team / JA vibe is nice
+ Great foundation in place. Should be highly likely more content is easy to add (weapons, gear etc.)

[b]So-so's[/b]
+/- Performance is SO-SO on 8700K / GTX 1080
+/- Best weapons are Russian, AK-12 by example. Not that I would say that US weapons should be better, I'd prefer weapons from Fabrique National.

[b]Cons[/b]
- Open world map / graphics look a bit dated.
- UI is clunky at best.
- Less mimicking from M&B, more focus on own innovation, if you could, please.

39802744.review:
The game itself is a great idea, and has massive potential. I however have a couple of ideas on how the game could change in the future.

UI
The game's graphics are pretty good, but the UI itself can be tinkered with to suit the game more properly

Combat 
The combat itself starts to feel repetitive afterwards. Mainly because it doesn't feel like too many factors determine whether you win the fight or not. If you have the most expensive squads or the most men, you'll win. Guerilla warfare is based on much more than that. Timing, having the high ground, AI being able to hide and wait, and thereby more effective flanking and ambushes would be cool to see in the future. Also I would like modifiers like having cover compared to not having cover really making a difference. Being able to catch an enemy squad running across a field would be priceless. I want every battle to feel different, and be able to do cool maneuvers and gaining the upper hand by using wit and tactics!

Alliances
I really don't know if this feature is implemented in the game, but if it isn't, i would really like to see it. 

Custom Squads
Being able to create own squads, and specialize units would be so cool. You could create different squads with different amounts of men, either armed for close combat battle or long distance battle, or anything in between; equipped with gear that suits your own playstyle. Being able to customize the soldiers' looks or even change their names and watch their battle stats would also be cool.

More opportunities
Lastly I want to generally see more opportunities in the game. It could be everything from managing a business that brings in money or recruits, being a soldier in another general's army, or even creating an own weapon brand?

Overall, I really recommend the game. It's great, and I am sure the dev team is committed to improving the game every day, so buy it guys!

39799297.review:
So I played a bit of the game and I see HUGE potential. But there are some very big problems before I actually recommend it.

1. It crashes easily
2. Loading takes forever and half the time acts like it is going to break
3. The sound is broken
4. Trying to change settings lags the game to nearly crashing
5. Interacting with anything lags the game horribly
6. You can't tell if the game is trying to load or is breaking cause there is no loading screen
7. The organization of merchants is horrible. Items and recruits should be ordered most expensive to least
8. Giving orders is a pain
9. Relationships work awkwardly
10. You cant tell if troops are chasing you or patrolling
11. Guns are weirdly priced. (since when is an Ak47 so expensive)
12. Combat seems to be mostly far ranged (if you want your troops to live)
13. Standard mode is the only existing mode and its essentially world domination
14 the world map is awkward and you have to follow your unit instead of being able to view the world freely with the camera.
14. Use of items is unclear
15. Menus are gross to look at
16. The tactical map in comabt doesn't give you a good eye for elevation
17. No gun custimization
18. Stats for equipment/recruits should have a more player friendly display such as bar graphs.
19. You can't see how your character looks (for those fashionistas out there)
20. When you're shot there is WAY too much blood that shows up on the screen that it is impossible to see
21. But my biggest problem is really jus the lag. I never know whether or not it is loading or crashing. The game slows my whole computer down.
22. You start off with too high of a prestige. Like you just started and you already have a faction

But we do have to remember that the game literally just came out to the public and I was expecting quite a few bugs. Although I wouldn't recommend the game yet, once some of these features are developed I would be happy to recommend the game.
39799297.developer_response: Thanks for the honest review and bug report. Can you email us your system specs so we can figure out what caused the lag？ We are devoted to improve this game by all means. contact@kkgamestudio.com. Thanks!

39798636.review:
Je me permets de faire une évalutation meme si j'ai peu d'heures de jeu.

Tout d'abord, ça ressemble énormement à Mount and blade pour ceux qui connaissent ! Que ça soit au niveau des compétences, inventaire, marchands, carte du monde..Cependant, l'époque n'est pas du tout la méme puisqu'on se situe ici dans un monde moderne, les combats ne se font pas donc pas à coup de haches et d'épées, mais à l'AK, fusil sniper..Et bien que je trouve ça génial ! C'est un peu déroutant, difficile puisqu'on se retrouve avec un simple pistolet au début ! Il faut donc s'armer de courage pour faire façe à des énemies beaucoup mieux équipés que nous.

Concernant les points positifs et négatifs que je retiens, voici  ma liste :

Points positifs :

-Graphisme  C'est pas magnifique mais c'est agréable

-Optimisation : Aucun problème, le jeu tourne trés bien 

-Concept : J'adore, comme j'ai adoré mount and blade  ! Mais c'est bien sur subjectif

-Prix : Il coute actuellement que 12e ! Et franchement il vaut largement son prix !

-Prise en main : C'est simple, sobre et efficace. Les ordres donnés aux squads sont trés basiques, simples par exemple.

-La difficulté : Bien que le jeu soit difficile au début, je trouve la difficulté bien jaugée. Pour réussir il  faut tout simplement pas foncer téte baissée sur les enemies mais adopter des tactiques et réfléchir un minimum.



Points négatifs : 

-Bugs : Forcément, on est en alpha donc on peut en rencontrer certains (Arbre sans physique, on s'abrite derrière mais les balles passent à travers..Lorsqu'on est touché par une balle, l'écran peut rester rouge..). Cependant j'ai pas rencontré de gros bug du genre crash ou autres.

-Contenu : Il y a a pour l'instant peu de contenu cependant on peut tout de méme s'amuser de nombreuses heures.

-IA : C'est un gros point noir pour moi, l'ia est complétement stupide, elle tire un peu n'importe où, se déplace bizarrement..

Pour fnir, ceux qui craignent que le jeu soit répétitif, il l'est, comme mount and blade l'est et pleins d'autres jeux tout aussi géniaux. Ne vous arrétez donc pas à ce détail,  c'est à vous de créer votre propre histoire et à la faire évoluer.

39796762.review:
So, the best way to describe this game is Mount and Blade mixed with ArmA.

You walk around a map like mount and blade or Total War, then engage in battles with other units or towns and cities. 

You can fight the battles in FPS or you can control it like a RTS. The only aim of the game is so far to capture and control 10 cities. 
Each city has traders that you can get weapons ammo, more units and food as you need to feed your troops.
That’s the game basically

This game is early access so yes, it is "rough" as I would explain it
-Graphics need a lot of work, very clunky and UI isn't the best
-AI this is a big area that needs work
-Very grindy to start, rifles are pretty expensive, you just start with a pistol
-Some sort of tutorial or maybe starting off as a grunt working for someone and working way up.
-A home base would be excellent so you could manage troops and defend it, make money etc.
-You can’t pick up loot until the end, I would like to see the ability to pick up weapons on the go.
-This game has ALOT of potential, this could be great.
-A minimap is badly needed!

Add in mod support with like new armies, user missions etc and they will be on to a winner.

Is it worth getting and playing now, well I've enjoyed it but I can see why many wouldn't

However, if you are undecided check out my video below.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=biMHIMEzVw8

39795794.review:
Freeman: Guerrilla Warfare (Early Access)
*Non hai voglia di leggerti questo muro di testo? Vai direttamente al fondo, dai pro e i contro e le conclusioni (pigrone! )*

Sono venuto a conoscenza di questo gioco in un video su youtube, e appena finito questo sono corso a prenotarlo. Perchè? Perchè trovo che sia un'idea assolutamente geniale: unire un gameplay sandbox alla Mount&Blade a sessioni di scontri in prima persona alla "sparatutto tattico". Il gioco è ancora in accesso anticipanto e quindi molte cose sono provvisiorie, ed altre verranno modificate o aggiunte. Cercherò di aggiornare la recensione ogni voltra che qualcosa di grosso cambierà :D.

TRAMA
Essendo un open-world non è presente una vera e propria trama (per adesso), avremo solo uno scopo: eliminare le fazioni che ci sono avverse e conquistare le loro città. Per il resto sta al giocatore crearsi una propria trama.

GAMEPLAY
Il gameplay si può definire come un incrocio tra Mount&Blade ed ArmA. Per chi non fosse familiare con questi giochi: noi saremo il comandante di una banda di merceneri e ci potremo muovere liberamente per la mappa. Il gioco si divide in due sequenze: la mappa e gli scontri. Nella prima ci potremo muovere liberamente con una visuale dall'alto  per il territorio, incontrando gruppi di soldati nemici e visitando città per rifornirci, reclutare o per assediarle. Nella parte degli scontri invece la visuale passerà in prima persona e potremo combattere di persona i nostri nemici, ed assegnare ordini di movimento alle nostre squadre. Il combattimento è un giusto misto di tattica e di azione. Non sarà punitivo come quello di Arma, ma nemmeno alla Rambo stile CoD. Negli scontri contro gruppi di nemici dovremo riuscire ad eliminarli con astuzia senza perdere troppe truppe, o la propria vita, mentre negli assedi alle città dovremo impadronirci di alcune zone tattiche difese dai nemici. I primi scontri che affronterete saranno blandi e noiosi, ma se avrete la pazienza di reclutare molti soldati e di procurarvi le armi adatte, essi si trasformeranno in combattimenti molto divertenti e tattici.
Sono presenti varie armature ed armi, ognuna di esse con le proprie munizioni (che dovremmo gestire saggiamente per evitare di rimanere a secco nel bel mezzo di uno scontro) e con i propri accessori. Il gunplay è abbastanza realistico, con l'oscillazione del mirino, il rinculo ed il bullet-drop, ognuno di essi può poi essere migliorato salendo di livello ed potenziando le appropriate skill. Quest'ultime vi permetteranno di avere più vita, poter gestire più squadre, viaggiare più in fretta ecc...
Potremo poi gestire i nostri uomini, migliorandoli o dandogli soldi per aumentare il loro morale. Essi saranno molto efficienti in battaglia e seguiranno molto bene i nostri ordini. Alcuni di loro potranno essere personalizzati (in quanto aspetto e skill) e avranno abilità particolari (come il richiedere il supporto aereo).
Oltre ai nostri compagni potremo poi gestire le città che conquisteremo, scegliendo cosa costruirci in modo da sfruttarle appieno.
Gli sviluppatori stanno progettando di aggiungere molte altre cose quali missioni secondarie che influiranno sulle fazioni, veicoli, nuovi oggetti e molto altro.
Si stanno anche dando da fare per risolvere i bug presenti ,pochi per ora, ma che possono a volte infastidire. (tipo i gruppi di nemici sulla mappa che a volte smetteranno di muoversi oppure il fatto che a volte membri del nostro party scompaiano).

GRAFICA
La grafica non è malaccio da come potete vedere negli screenshoot ed il gioco mi va molto fluido con tutti i settaggi al massimo (anche se non posseggo i requisiti consigliati). L'unica pecca è che per ora non è possibile settare le singole opzioni grafiche, potremo solo decidere tra vari preset (lower-low-medium ecc...).

SOUNDTRACK
Non sono presenti molte tracce nel gioco, ma quelle durante gli scontri saranno dinamiche, ovvero cambieranno fluidamente a seconda della situazione in cui ci troveremo. Ad esempio durante gli schieramenti la musica sarà calma e piena di tensione, ma appena inizieremo uno scontro a fuoco con un nemico passerà ad un tono molto più dinamico. Questa feature è molto interessante e spero che gli sviluppatori la sfrutteranno appieno in futuro e che aggiungano più musiche.

In definitiva:

PRO
-Gameplay dinamico e divertente
-Gli scontri, se i soldati sono numerosi, possono diventare estremamente divertenti e tattici
-Difficoltà regolabile, da a prova di fesso a realismo intensivo 
-Gli sviluppatori  stanno continuando a supportarlo e sono previste molte aggiunte future
-Inoltre il gioco viene aggiornato con molta frequenza!

CONTRO
-Attualmente non c'è molto oltre a quello che vedete da video e screenshot
-Qualche bug, a volte fastidioso


Quindi, Freeman: Guerrilla Warfare promette molto bene al momento, ma come sempre, la scelta finale è la vostra. Quando un gioco è in early access tutto può succedere. Potremo vederlo tra un paio d'anni tra le vette dei giochi più acquistati di Steam oppure abbandonato completamente come molti (troppi) altri. Personalmente ho fiducia negli sviluppatori e sono certo che sapranno sfruttare al meglio il tutto. Se siete proprio molto indecisi prendetelo quando è in saldo, o al massimo giocateci ma non superate le 2 ore per il rimborso ; )

Qui tutto da Quazar

UPDATE! I've gotten quite a bit better since my initial review, and also managed to capture my first town. Overall my view of the game is positive. The combat is fun, the command system is easy to use, and pretty simple to master. the gun variety is still relatively narrow, but thats a non-issue for me, especially because the Dev's have said weapon attachments are going to be implemented in one of the first major patches. one big thing and really only real downside to the game right now is it just feels repititive. Get into a dozen battles with bandits, upgrade your army, level up, buy new equipment, repeat. they haven't been able to implement any type of missions yet for other factions, so the gameplay is limited to a field battle in hilly semi-forested grasslands, or town assaults to expand your little fiefdom. I anticipate that this game will become excellent given time to grow, and fairly soon I expect it will be much more fleshed out, I still standby my recommendation, however if you are expecting a game with meat on its bones, I would hold off on purchasing for the meantime, as its only a skeleton, albeit a well made one right now.

39793301.review:
I've been burned by Early Access a couple times before, and this is my first dive into making this type of purchase in a long time. So far, here's what I have to say:

IMHO, the devs have got a brilliant concept on their hands. I mean, they kinda struck gold with this one (it's ArmA + Mount&Blade, with a hint of Squad / Insurgency / PUBG / STALKER put into it! AND YES, THAT'S GENIUS!) And props to them for putting it into execution despite the risk of stumbling and fumbling into the public eye. It's pretty good effort for their 1st day of release into Early Access, but still, the game as a whole remains very raw and rough. It doesn't just need polishing. It needs WAAAAY more time in the oven in terms of almost everything (AI, graphics, features, in-game economics, gunplay, story, the possibility of multiplayer?, etc). Tbh, at its current state, all you get is the game's very skeletal structure -- it's a solid experience that's fun to play, but only as a time-killer. It's got replayability, but not retentivity. So why am I recommending it, then? Well, besides the fact that its on sale, that's coz I'm jotting down this review in good faith. Here's to hoping that these devs get a lot more backers so that they'll eventually be able to put all of their plans for the game's future into fruition, and that they don't just cut and run with all our money.

39790816.review:
Интересный гибрид жанров, который могут взять на заметку фанаты Jagged Alliance и Mount and Blade. Поклонники Arma, возможно, будут плеваться. А может и нет.

Как шутер, игра проигрывает зрелищным боевикам, но чувство боевых операций здесь присутствует с лихвой. Командование осуществляется отрядами бойцов из 3-5 человек, в командирском меню задаем тактику и маршруты движения. Бойцы стреляют (пока частенько в холмы и землю), кидают дымы, паникуют и отступают. ИИ пока не блещет умом, но и особого раздражения не вызывает. Под обстрелом враги сразу ложатся, а вот с распознаванием укрытий пока проблемы. 

Для своего персонажа можно купить в городах различное оружие и броню, не хватает дополнительных настроек оружия в плане прицелов и обвесов. Остальное управление и взаимодействие с картой, прокачка, до боли напоминает Mount&Blade. Кто знает, возможно даже эта игра выйдет раньше Bannerlord?) В целом, впечатления довольно приятные. Надеюсь проект будет развиваться и наполнятся идеями, к примеру: ночные бои, штурм укреплённых лагерей, а не просто городов и т.д. Но нужно понимать, что это ранний доступ со всеми вытекающими.

39786672.review:
Freeman: Guerrilla Warfare是一款結合即時戰略、小隊戰術、第一人稱射擊、開放世界冒險地圖的搶先體驗遊戲。

目前遊戲中你能做的事情有以下:
1.大地圖旅行、貿易、遇敵
2.戰鬥中使用戰術地圖以即時戰略的方式控制你的傭兵小隊戰鬥
3.也能在戰鬥中以第一人稱的方式直接與敵人交火
4.收集資金，改善你的武器與防具，武器類型目前有 手槍、衝鋒槍、步槍、狙擊槍、輕機槍、火箭發射器等。
5.透過經驗累積升級你的部隊，像戰團一樣的具有某整程度的轉職線設計。
6.透過經驗累積培養自己的人物，升級耐力、戰鬥能力或是領導能力。
7.後期實力充足時，你可以攻擊並將強盜或是主要陣營的城鎮據為己有。

想直接看遊玩狀況的人可以參考我的實況影片:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Ju3aksG0Cyk

評價:
畫面-★★★☆☆
音效-★★★☆☆
音樂-★★☆☆☆
操作-★★★☆☆
內容-★★★☆☆

結語:
遊戲目前還在搶鮮體驗狀態，內容量仍嫌不足，但是潛力十足，而且售價親民，如果你喜歡騎馬與砍殺:戰團，這款絕對不能錯過，在下也希望能透過評論幫這款遊戲爭取到更多的支持，讓它能開發的更完善，在未來大放異彩!

39786660.review:
If you've always wanted a modern day RPG FPS that isn't top down, post apocalyptic, or almost 20 years old, then this is the perfect game for you. The dev team is ambitious, driven and cares about its customer base with fast responses and the statement of dedication to work long and hard on FGW. The game features an intuitive AI that takes cover once fired upon, and features smoke grenades to give you that intense fire fight feel. 
I've dreamed of a game just like this, and if there ever is a mix of Jagged Alliance 2 and Mount and Blade playstyle with its unique twist of real-time action, this would be it. 

The responsive and professional dev team is definitely a big plus in addition to a very addictive, and highly replayable modern day FPS.

Pleasently surprised. Picked it up on a whim because I had cash in my account and it seemed to be right up my alley. As other reviewers have said it's like Mount and Blade with guns and, so far, pretty watered down in comparison. I could see it getting extremely repetative as it stands but I'm still really enjoying it and hoping with additional features added it can become something great. Gun play is better than I expected it to be but could also still use some work. 

My one complaint thus far is that while some items are pretty self explanatory as to their use, especially if you have some experience with M&B, others I'm a little confused about and would appreciate the addition of a small blurb of info on whether or not it actually has a use.

Hope they'll add ways to command your squads from the first person view because sometimes it's a little difficult to get your positions right with only the map to give orders.

I'm going to give it a thumbs up for now because the price is right for what you get, it's fun and I haven't run into any major issues so far. Hoping for a good future for this game.

39785358.review:
用骑砍嵌套武装突袭，想法很好，底子不错。只是游戏刚刚发售，不足之处还挺多，玩法也略薄弱。

开局一把马卡洛夫，装备全靠抢！
不过出生时自带的手下都端着AK，作为游击队领袖的玩家只有一把手枪，还是挺违和的，其实完全可以给玩家稍微好一点的起步武器，或者干脆取消出生自带部队，丰富可招募的低阶部队，让玩家真正地体验白手起家。

指挥系统的确是一大创新，只是在战斗中还要摁M进入指挥界面有点麻烦，希望能找到更好的能让玩家即时指挥的解决方法，或者说直接引入骑砍本身的指挥方式也不是不可以。

射击手感和枪械模型还说得过去，没有武器挂件少了一点自定义枪械的玩法。

界面交互挺简单的，没有中文其实对游玩影响不大，画质一般，并且有点糊。

既然有装备系统，为什么不做一个第三人称射击模式呢？起码让玩家看看自己买的装备穿上的效果嘛。

游戏内的互动还有点少，城镇或者说营地只提供了最基础的交易、招募、休息的功能，既然是现代战争背景，还是希望互动性更强一点。既没有农民让我抢，又没有村子让我烧，骑砍玩家非常难受。

有一个小细节值得注意，如果射击时不打光子弹就换新弹匣，那么这个没打光的弹匣就会直接被扔掉emmmm，很Hardcore，但是其实有更好的解决方法，类似叛乱（IInsurgency）那种，弹匣没打光就更换，还会留在身上，留待使用。和骑砍中箭矢不用补充的设定不同，战斗后需要去城镇购买补充新弹匣，很真实。

枪械在切换射击模式时，并没有明确的提示用以辨别切换到了什么模式。并且，下一次战斗还需要重新切换。

人员士气的构成有些迷，伤亡对士气打击非常大，似乎食物对提升士气没有明显作用，还是要特么给钱才管用。。。

战斗bgm好评，节奏感挺强，在双方交火时还会自动变奏，十分应景。

开发者承诺会定期更新并且公布开发计划，这游戏有不错的创意，我看商店页面的简介与更新日志都是中文的，也许游戏也会在日后加入中文，未来的内容必然会更加丰富，我比较看好它。

Tan pronto como me enteré del juego me emocioné y lo compré a pocas horas del lanzamiento del early access.

Lo dicho en la mayoría de análisis, una mezcla de mount and blade con Arma.

Actualmente algo verde, tiene 5 facciones, y algunas ciudades que de momento no puedes visitar a menos que las ataques.

Recluta tu gente, entrénala, combate contra bandidos, gana dinero, mejora tu equipamento y empieza a capturar ciudades, de momento las parties enemigas no te persiguen ni te agreden aunque estés en negativo con su facción, al menos a mi no me ha pasado.

No hay gran variedad de armas ni de objetos, sólo existe una misión de momento, la cual consiste en capturar y mantener 10 ciudades, funciona lo básico del juego que es armar una party, ver su progreso y pelear contra otras parties, su mapa táctico es fácil de manejar y las mecánicas de juego me parecen un giro interesante.

El juego tiene un potencial enorme y la desarrolladora parece interesarse por el feedback de la comunidad. Si deseas ver el progreso de este diamante en bruto cómpralo, si buscas un juego para pasar unas cuantas horas, dejarlo un rato y luego jugarlo para sorprenderte con los cambios y nuevas actualizaciones cómpralo, si quieres un juego completo y pulido para viciarte cientos de horas, mejor espera un poco a que se siga mejorando, agreguen nuevos módulos y variedades.

39784272.review: So for an extremely indie game in "Day 1" early access, this game has massive amounts of potential. In concise words, this is the love child of ARMA and Mount & Blade. Combining the tactical combat of the ARMA seires and the grand map and RPG gameplay of Mount and Blade. The gunplay is actually very solid. So solid it actually surpasses ARMA for me, and I am a longtime ARMA player. It is smooth and for the most part, precise. It almost reminds me of Battlefield when it comes to weapon handling. Now the animations aren't the greatest but they are fairly good and the audio is about the same quality of a COD title. Commanding your troops in battle is a bit rudimentary at the moment, having to stop mid firefight to pull up a map and issue flanking and movement orders to your men, but if you can ass a radial command system, something akin to OpFP: Red River, the you could have a very smooth and tactically satisfying command system, utilizing the map for massive maneuvers and utilizing the radial command for instant on the spot commands for your men. As for the grand map gameplay, it is a very shallow experience. Commanders don't give quests, you cannot roam around the towns, and the trading is very face value. Be that as it may, for something that is early access, we have a quite playable and strong foundation for what could be a fantastic game. The only thing I pray is that the dev's make this game mod friendly. Much of Moutn & Blades success can be largely attributed to it's modability, allowing the communtiy to create entirely new experiences. Flesh out the grand campaign, fien tune your command UI, work on AI cover detection, add depth to the map and towns, and give this game a modding communtiy and you got yourself one hell of an experience ahead of us. Please do not abandon this project!

39784190.review:
Edit - 08MAR2018 - I'm still not happy enough with the game to give it a thumbs up, but I will say that I am majorly impressed with how almost every day there has been a patch to update the game. It makes me wish they had held off on doing early access. 

The other reviews are correct. It's Mount and Blade with guns and without the role playing mechanics. Also you can't auto skip battles without a high chance of losing. 

The reason why I gave the game a thumbs down is because I'm unsure of how devoted the developers are to finishing the game. Are they going to make it more like Mount and Blade or are they going to treat it like Blood and Gold: Carribean! Which is essentially an unfinished game because sales were not sustaining development of the game and the developers eventually just claimed the game was finished.

Improvements I'd want to see.

A skip battle option - my current experience has only allowed me to skip battle when I die.

Instead of instant buildings, have it be based over time - The developers have stated that putting a day/night cycle into the game is part of their development goal however I don't recall reading how that would affect the game beyond it being either day or night.

A tutorial - There are currently picture tutorials however you may be left guessing what they meant by some of the instructions. I hope that when they finally input a story mode that the tutorial will flow seamlessly.

Make the compass, walkie talkie, canteen, map, binoculars useful - currently those are just scrap items that you can sell. Also instead of a canteen, use a camelback. 

Make the FLC jacket be an overlay to body armor - I was super excited when I first saw an FLC in the game because it reminded me of my days in the army. However I was super disappointed when I saw that you could only wear either a FLC or armor. Typically you wear the FLC over the armor in order to carry grenades, ammo and medical supplies.

Change weapons of your individual soldier units - I have a feeling it's currently not like this because that would be hard and tedious and buggy every time a new patch would be made.

Individual weapon upgrades - I was really disappointed that I couldn't change scopes with the sniper rifle or add a forward grip to my weapons.

The skills system - I have mixed feelings over you put 10 points in aiming so now you can aim better. I feel like Casey Hudson (Mass Effect 1, 2, 3, creative director) was partially right when he said your skills should not be based on how many points you put into that skill. Your skill should be based on your skill. It feels extremely unreleastic when you're able to use a MG as a sniper rifle. However for this type of game, maybe that's for the best, because MG's are really supposed to  be used as suppressive weapons that tear through buildings and vehicles. This game doesn't have destructible environments so what use is a MG then?
39784190.developer_response: Hi. Thanks for the review. We are fully devoted to the development of the game and we are aiming at the similar path that M&B initially went through. We have a very clear plan on how to make the game better over time, which is based on our vision and community input. We are totally indie, free from publishers and investors and we are in total control of our development situation. The community shows great interests in this game and we are developing a game which we see great potential so we have 100% passion and devotion to this project.

39784099.review:
先说结论，对于喜欢骑砍和战术策略类游戏的玩家，这一款折后40元的小品级独立游戏还是值得推荐的，但如果冲着第一人称射击而购买的玩家，多半是要失望的。

游戏的介绍把本作称为骑砍和ARMA的结合，根据我的经验，这款游戏和骑砍比较像，而射击部分是比较弱化的。作为游戏的基本机制，领军作战，特别是人数较多，能达到百人战场的战斗，玩家自身的作用是已经被弱化的。这就好比现实中的战场，虽然连级指挥官也会亲临战场，但不到万不得已，指挥官是不会冲锋陷阵的。一来在人数众多的战场上个人的作用没有那么大，二来指挥官的牺牲会使部队群龙无首，在这款游戏中就体现在玩家阵亡后，部队自行战斗会有不小的伤亡，即便赢了也可能是杀敌一千，自损八百。因此我说，这款游戏并不向射击游戏玩家推荐。

游戏的大地图设计是向骑砍借鉴的，甚至游戏中很多对话，城镇功能的设计都隐约能看到骑砍的影子，但由于游戏目前处于EA阶段，城镇功能较少，和其他阵营的指挥官所能进行的对话选项也很少。尽管如此，考虑到游戏的售价还算良心，骑砍玩家和策略游戏爱好者不妨一试。

除了上述两类玩家群体，其实我还想把这款游戏推荐给RTS游戏的爱好者，因为这款游戏的战场指挥功能是挺有RTS的感觉的。在我游玩的过程中，初期由于单兵武器价格较贵，我只能拿着一把小手枪躲在部队后面瑟瑟发抖，但我在指挥部队推进的过程中发现该作的指挥功能设计的还不错，比起骑砍的平面地图，本作的地图是立体的，所以玩家在指挥中可以观察地形，做出对己方更有利的战术部署。另外目前部队的AI也还算比较成熟，可以有效作战，也会在合适的时候找好掩体或就地卧倒，因此在后方找好隐蔽，指挥部队也是本作初期十分高效的一种玩法。（特别是初期买不起枪时，最好是攒钱招募高级雇佣军，多刷土匪，很快就能富起来。）

当然，作为一款EA中的游戏，BUG数量也是不少，比如目前个人技能加点Trade，说明是购买价格每点下降10%，但我发现似乎价格并没有变化。另外在战斗中我也见过已经被击杀的敌军还蹲在原地不动，不会攻击，但还能被击杀一次。另外一个问题就是前面已经提到的功能较少的问题，希望制作组未来能尽力完善这一款有想法的游戏吧。

——————————————————————————

补充几点建议，如果开发商能看到。

首先，战术地图指挥时的行进点设计有点不适合即时战斗系统，如果用在像doorkick这种可以随时暂停的战术策略游戏上，行进点能表现出玩家的战术考量，但在不含暂停的即时战斗中，行进点节奏太慢了，在战斗较为激烈时可能会出现误操作。毕竟即时战略游戏在红警2时已经是最后一次采用行进点这种操作设计了，这种操作方法已经不适合快节奏的指挥。

第二，建议制作组采用骑砍长按“F1”指派部队的指挥方式，否则在战斗中打开地图进行指挥既不够直观，也太浪费时间。

第三，大地图下的部队AI亟待提升，地图上的各个势力的部队都不怎么动，甚至我只有几名士兵走过二三十人的土匪身边他们都不会攻击我，感觉这样跑商，做任务有点无聊。

————————————————————

忍不住来给制作组点一个大大的赞，刚评测完，今天已经更新解决了trade技能失效的bug,还添加了FPS下的一些简单的指挥功能，很棒很良心！

Amazing pace of fixing bugs and adding new features! Keep working and your game will surely be more attractive!

本人不才，发表一哈自己觉得游戏出现的某些小问题，不喜勿喷
1，以目前游戏内容来说，内容还是太少，空有类似骑砍的地图与世界，却没有与之配套的软件，比如多样的兵种树，玩家可以选择不同的阵营加入或者是更多的任务，讲真的，一上午我一个任务都没见到，全部是野外找土匪杀
2，游戏目前平衡性存在不少的问题，比如刚刚进入游戏时玩家过弱（你敢信你手下的炮灰兵都能人手一把半自动，你却只能拿个马卡洛夫）还有就是某些兵种有些尴尬，举个例子，刚刚进入游戏时送给玩家一队FAC的步兵（我不知道是不是人人送的都一样）这队步兵最直观的体现就是假的面板数据，初期过于强悍，高士气，打得准，枪好，防弹装备还齐全，但是...顶级的FAC就是个坑,先不说枪全部换了AK74U,人家把头盔和防弹衣全部都脱了，几乎不着片甲，士气也是低的一批莫名其妙就跑了

39783698.review:
This game has a lot of potential. There are some issues however.
- Enemies glitching and floating unable to die
- Enemies spawning ontop of you and your men killing you with grenades
- Enemies killing you before you hit deploy
- No real clear points as to which weapons have scopes and which don't
- No sound effect or voice volume control
- Occasional UI glitches so you don't know how many skill points or various things like that [not a big issue at all]
+ Fun weapons to mess with and test
+ The troop command screen is easy to understand and learn to use
+ Easy to understand the controls and combat
+ The combat is fluid and the timer is helpful when you get tired of searching for enemies
+ The seige gameplay is also really fun along with other large scale combat [Although frames go down a bit when combat happens]
Those are the main issues with combat I've found so far.
Other than that more weapons would be nice but as is the amount and type weapons and gunplay is fantastic.

Overall, however, the game itself is fantastic already and hopefully gets better as time goes on. I can't wait to see what the game is like when Early Access is over.

39778934.review:
The game is pretty okay in my opinion, i love mount & blade and this is basically a modern warfare version of that game. If you like mount & blade you will definitely like this as well (unless you don't like the modern warfare thing of course).

I've only played a couple of hours as of yet and I will probably update this review when I've gotten further into the game.

[b] Setting [/b]
The setting is nice, it feels good and the music compliments it nicely.

[b] Map [/b]
The map looks cool, in later stages i hope to see more biomes, but for now this will do very well. It's off to a good start.

[b] Battles [/b]
Battles are good, the shooting is nice and the Ai of your squads and the enemies is done pretty well for the stage of the game. Some movement issues here and there which could be nicely resolved with a button to order the squad to get back in there original formation.
Moving your units around is easy (now and then a bit clunky but very smooth for the stage of the game) and changing their course is just as easy as well. Battles can be quite challenging too, if you're caught slipping it's going to cost you some money which can be devastating in the early moments of the campaign.
The map for the battles is designed very well and gives room for flanking and such which is really usefull in this game. Love it!

[b] Guns [/b]
The SMGs in this game are so far my favorites for multiple reasons. They shoot nice, you can see your bullit properly and it's really nice for sneaking up on enemies and wiping an enemy squad by yourself in a quick well aimed bursts. Really satisfying to do.
The rifles look really nice and the damages on most of them are good, but you can barely to not at all see where your bullet is going. This is really annoying because most of the time you can't see the impact of the bullet either because there is 10 other people shooting at your target as well. It ends up costing me way to much ammo to kill one guy when i can also just use an SMG and kill a guy in 5-6 shots at ranges at which you should be having an advantage with rifles. 
Snipers are nice but they need some getting used to, less hard to get used too than the rifles though.
The pistols are honestly the most acurate guns in the game right now and they do a nice amount of damage as well. I honestly would prefer almost any of the pistols above some of the rifles in this game simply because they shoot so much better and the damage difference is neglectable because you can actually hit shots with the pistols.

[b] Sound [/b]
The sound is very lacking sadly, almost all the guns have the same sound. Also there are not enough individual sliders for sounds and this is very annoying as they feel unbalanced and a lot of them to loud like the things squads tell you in combat. Another thing with the sound is the gunshots in battles are sort of half done. You can hear pretty acurately which direction the gunshot is coming from, but the distance of the shot is a mess. You can be standing 10-20 meters away from an enemy and it sounds like you're a 100 meters away from him. Also a big problem when trying to locate where your enemy is because you just can't pin-point where the enemy is at. Your just looking around hoping to see a gun's flash and looking at your map all the time hoping your squads will soon spot them so you can attempt to take a shot after taking shots for 1,5 minutes, giving the enemy a lot of time to kill you and your guys.

[b] Bugs, glitches, crashes [/b]
There are some bugs in it, but it is to be expected with early acces at launch. It's nothing that can't be worked around though and I'm happy to say that I have not yet experienced a game crash. 
Some bugs (which have ocured to me and a friend of mine once in 6 hours of gameplay) require you to restart the game to be fixed, others bugs and glitches are so minor it's just goofy and you can just laugh at them and continue playing. 

All with all I think this game is really nice, there is 100% sure something here that can be made into an amazing game. 
If the devs keep up the great work this will definetely be my main singleplayer game until mount & blade 2 comes out.

For now i think this game deserves a 6,8/10

39778911.review:
This game is a rock.  You can tell it's a rock because of all the jagged edges.  However, you chip those edges away long enough and maybe it'll turn into a gem.

Don't get me wrong, this is a decent rock.  Pre-alpha, even.  And I have A LOT to complain about.  For example, I don't like how 5.45mm rounds aren't a part of the game, but that's a petty complaint (thought the 7.62 general purpose machine gun is a .50 caliber, so maybe caliber accuracy isn't top on the priority list).  Another petty complaint is that there are a lot of spelling errors and the way things are worded are just... meh.  Some of the stats basically have the same name while using a different word which is just confusing, the UI is HORRIBLE, and if you leave your skirmish to random chance then your badass mercenary companions will end up getting creamed by some low tier brigands.

What this really needs right now is for a bit more... guidance.  Really, they drop you off in an unnamed Slavic civil war with multiple factions.  If you want a story, there is none.  Just be a freedom fighter and fight for the freedoms you choose.  Not that you can implement any of these freedoms, mind you.  Doubt they'd implement the ability to grant freedom of speech, state markets, or sharia law in a pre-alpha release.

As of the first day of release, the game crashed once with me and threatened to crash again at the end of every battle.  The save game/load game feature is a mysterious function where you lose ALL your shit despite loading.  Not necessarily your shit, mind you, but I saved before recruiting someone.  Got creamed by bandits, reloaded and discovered I couldn't recruit who I wanted to recruit anymore.  Mysterious function indeed.

You're going to be stuck with your starter pistol for a while because not-rubles (called credits) are kind of a hassle to farm.  For a pair of airsoft gloves (called Tactical Gloves but is definitely Condor Syncro Tactical Gloves; can't fool me) it's over 600 credits.  Assuming they sell at the same price you can get them online, it's 50 USD.  Let's say they are 60, for math's sake.  So, one USD would be worth ten credits.  Admittedly, that's not so bad because there are worse currencies out there, but you have to get into battle after battle JUST to get an AKM.  Of course, your enemies who you farm won't drop their guns because... reasons.

Apart from the grind, lack of story/guidance, clunkiness, lack of user-friendliness, grammatical mistakes, having to pay your troops daily rather than weekly, STRANGE caliber selections, and LOADS of other inconveniences... it's not that bad.  Just needs A LOT of work and could use more influence from Mount and Blade's world map as well as Arma's inventory system (ie where you can add a sight or grenade launch to your rifle).  I'm looking forward to seeing what this game will become, but for now?  I'd suggest you wait a bit if you're wanting more.

The concept of forming your own little guerrilla faction and liberating your own nation while struggling with logistics is a nice concept.  Very Che-Inspiring, you know?  But for now, it's just a rock with a potential gem hidden inside.

3/5

39778692.review:
So, as of release day I would say that this game is a success, in the since that there are not any game-breaking bugs. What I have noticed is a nice map, but a bit small. Some things that I have noticed are that this game has a unique ideas of combining Arma and Mount & Blade, it combines the map movement and market system of Mount and blade and a similar combat system of arma. 

Things I reccomend fixing:
1.The Overpowered bandits:  I personally am no stranger to a FPS game but this one is cutthroat, my first engagement I lost 3 squads to 11 bandits who had some serious accuracy. 
2. The Market system: The ingame trading with cities is a bit basic, simply drag an item and get paid or pay for an item this area I would like to see improved. 
3. Villages: So far villages can be captured, and improved, but from what I have saw is that there is no way to actually look at your village unless attacking or defending it. Perhaps some sort of "roam the streets" would be a good fit.
4. Diplomacy: Instead of just attacking everyone, why not have some agreements, alliance, vassal, etc.
5. A more fluid AI. The game has a decent AI with some really basic orders of charge, fire, or hold fire, adding more tactics and formations would really spruce combat up. 


Overall This game is by far worth a buy in it`s curent stage.

39778511.review:
I am (EDIT: MORE) flashed about this game! (EDIT: after first patch, late at launchday)

First i would recommend to wait a few days since there are some bugs/exploits inside right now, but nevertheless keep it in your mind - it will be a great game (imho it is right now - i dont care about some bugs in EA)

Gameplay:
who would like a game just for FPS would be disapointed - you start with a pistol and have no chance to win a fight with just FPS (at moment, think they change "starter kit" soon).
Who would like a pure strategic command game would be also disapointed because there are lots of other (deeper) games with more and more detailed command options (but they work for more options to be released within few days)
The fascinating part in this game is the combination between theese 2 parts - to command your sqadrons and take part within their fights by shoting also.
Pure "rambos" and "one-men-armys" have no chance - you can only be sucessful if you take use of your sqads, use them wisely, take advantage of terrain and stay a little bit behind them for not to be oneshot by someone. No need to be a hero in first line to be sucessful in this game ;) Mostly its better to take cover and wait for the others to run into your fire line. Brain is more than bullets in this game!

CONs: (EDIT: the team patched the game and works hard to eliminate the bugs!!!)
- bugs inside (many bugs just fixed end of the first launch day by patch)
- not all content build in right now, but coming soon (soon means: REALLY soon)
- balancing is not optimal (but just adjusted little bit by first patch)
- weaponaccuracy/bulletdrops are worse -> balancing (little adjusted by patch)
- controlling is sometimes not easy because you cant see terrainformation well on strategic map for redirecting your squads and/or you cant make orders to your squads without strategic map

PROs: (Dev-team works hard and communty-demand-based) !!!!!!!!!
+ nice mixture of strategic command and FPS
+ open world
+ AI is not as dumb as i expected XD
+ devs react on suggestions in forum and are open for players demands
+ compagnon-squad is planed within short time (as i heared - but not sure)

so overall: 
its a not finally "polished" game so far - therefore it is Early Access, but its on best way to get a nice game with both - strategy and FPS
I can give without any questions a "thumbs up" - its worth to buy - at least to keep on watchlist if you cant deal with the bugs/exploits an EA-game has for sure

39778124.review:
Хоть на данный момент игра очень сыра,она крайне интригующая из-за совмещение Mound and blade и ArmA,от первого большая часть геймплнея,от второго механица стрельбы и частично инвентарь,причём,по моему,на моей памяти это первый полноценный клон(не в плохом смысле) M&B.
Если вы играли в M&B,то в Freeman: Guerrilla Warfare вам будет очень легко освоиться,но есть несколько отличий:
Во-первых,это собственно то,что здесь огнестрельное оружие,а значит у ВСЕХ дальний бой и даже на самой низкой сложности умереть очень легко.
Во-вторых,здесь нанимаються воиска не по одному,а отрядами по 5 человек,но сама игра не такая масштабная в плане кол-ва человек,в городах в среднем,например,75 БОЙЦОВ или 15 отрядов.
В-третьих,здесь не получиться тупо идти в бой,сказав "в атаку",здесь каждому отряду нужно давать отдельный приказ и даже в какой то степени микроконтролить,но благо перед началом боя вы можете им спланировать приказ и при этом этом сама планировка довольно удобная,если не считать кнопку по-умолчанию,на которую она поставлена.
В остальном это будет всё тот же родной геймплей M&B и если вы хотели что то в похожем геймплее,но моды надоели,а до Bannerlord'a ещё чёрт знает сколько ждать,то можете покупать,хотя бы для того,что бы поддержать разработчиков,благо игра стоит недорого и хоть,опять же,игра ещё очень сырая,но подаёт очень большие и сильные надежды.

39775832.review:
quite enjoying it. got a lot of potential.

as a note i am only in the early game ans as of writing only an hour or two played so these are initial notes.

pros: feels like mount and blade combined with arma or squad.
for day 1 of early access it feels quite nice.

cons:
most of these are small things

when you get wounded, you seem to auto resolve, this is frustrating when you have some good units such as snipers versues weak units because it doesnt seem to take the quality of troops into account eg i would lose 10 troops in a battle i may usually lose a maximum of 5 in, if there was a way to have the battle carry on and give the troops over to the ai, this would be really good (while having the option to auto resolve). 

the big bushes: these drive me nuts, i walk into the colision box which is slightly bigger than the bush itself, also if im walking and not focusing i get stopped by the bushes, if you shrunk the colision box down slightly (or removed it entirely) it would feel much better.

shadows: you only see the gun, arm and hands shadows of the player. the other shadows are pretty decent though.

in the info tab (tab) on the campaign screen under the players faction the first letter is lower case while the rest are upper case.



things i would suggest adding:

a custom skirmish mode 
attachments for some of /all of the weapons: silencers, scopes/sights for the rifles - 1x - 4x?
an option to change the squad sizes before creating a campaign eg small, med, large (for late game, 3, 6, 9 squad high teir units (as of now its 3 units for the merc sniper team and equivelent across other forces - could be an option for 6 or 9).
starting in different areas, fighting for other factions and chosing who you start at war with .


over all a pretty decent game witha load of potential.
